actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.

summary.text: Directs the Postmaster General to issue a special postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright. Provides that such stamp shall be issued and sold for such period as the Postmaster General shall determine.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in honor of Patience Lovell Wright.
